original: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca
analyzed: hetu paccayā na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva

original: naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na ahetuko ca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
analyzed: hetu paccayā na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu

original: ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca iva na ahetuko ca na ahetuko ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca na ahetukam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava
sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāro
